Posts.Content: Aug 24, 2009 09:25PM Sashiko wrote: Greetings from Down Under, I am a 3 years survivor with Grade 3, stg. 2 aggressive breast cancer.  My surgeon told me that I had "too many to count" nodes involved and he removed "the lot"!!! I struggle with Femara, having tried the lot.  Terrible leg pain, alopecia, weight gain, headaches etc. but it is such a joy to read how many of you girls have survived long periods with good quality of life. I wish every one of you, good luck, good health, peace and friendship, Sashiko
Posts.Title: 23 nodes removed - all positive joannnc Beverly11
